products.title: Warm White Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: White Gloss Aluminium Venetian
products.description: When you need a bright white blind look no further than the gloss white. This is a pure and simple blind, but will give your room a crisp and fresh look to it. Use this blind to help lift your room and give a light and airy feel to it. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Chalk Dust Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The light grey colour in this blind is anything but boring. Greys get overlooked as a colour but we think that when placed in the right environment this colour can really shine. This lighter toned grey will fit alongside many decor styles and gives a clean and sophisticated look to your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.description: Vitra blackout is one of their most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. Revamp your home or office space with a stunning vitra blackout white vertical blind. products.description: Their white unicolour vertical blind is a true white shade. Ideal for modern iterior styles. Light filtering & resistent to moisture. Their stunning unicolour range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options. products.title: Unicolour Fr Off White 89mm Vertical Blind

Their stunning unicolour range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options. products.title: Roma, Polar - Vertical Blind
products.description: Not quite mint, yet not quite aqua either, the roma in polar is a unique, icy green shade that will add a cool sophisticated to your home dcor. Soft but sturdy cotton-feel fabric gathers neatly into hanging louvres that can be opened and closed swiftly and neatly. Makeover a white bathroom by using it as the perfect canvas for the polar, supplementing it with silver fixtures and fittings; or create a gorgeous cool hue in the guest bedroom, where your visitors will love to wake up to this refreshing shade.

products.title: Richmond, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The ice white of the richmond pure is fresh and inviting, and its feathery lines offer texture and depth. The sleek, clean lines of the vertical blind complement the pattern perfectly, providing a handsome contrast between hard and soft. Place the pure in the bathroom, where its clean white hue will match a classic suite wonderfully. Keep the room bright and fresh by sticking to a one-colour palette, accenting only with silver fixtures and fittings for a contemporary feel.

products.title: Decor, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a stylish window arrangement, choose the dcor in pure, where a fusion of silk-inspired threads craft a modest blind with creative arcs and elevated stitching. This brilliantly white fabric rests on movable louvres to allow you to control the amount of light and ventilation entering the room. For a delicately stylish kitchen with fresh and reviving colour, match the stark pure with peaceful duck egg blue hues.

products.title: Henderson, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: In slightly raised stitching, the henderson pure displays subtle stripes on a smooth white canvas. The colour is a soft ice white with a clean and refreshing aesthetic and, hung in the vertical slats, looks streamlined and ordered. Hang the pure in your home office for a studious yet fresh look. Team with cool blues to continue the clean, contemporary theme, opting for light wooden furniture and floorboards, then adorning with throws, cushions, and accessories in subtle blues and whites.

products.title: Rochester, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The striking rochester in pure contains both brilliant, white shade and mesmerising adornments. The dreamy, satin-like threads create a fascinating display of contrasting textures, producing a classy look, with the added benefit of adjustable louvres to allow both ventilation and privacy. To create a serene haven with calming hues, present the pure in your restroom amidst a soothing setting of cornflower blue.

products.title: Roma, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Roma's pure filter blind is just that - pure, in the form a beautiful snow white. This lightly textured blind will allow light to trickle through whilst offering privacy and style when closed. But you can always use the adjustable louvres to open it, and let in all the light you want. Generate a clean and refreshing look in your bedroom by combining the pure with cool pastel blues or greens; or hang in a family bathroom alongside sea blues or soft aquas, and accessorise with silvers or golds depending on your preference.

products.title: Mississippi Taped White Real Wood
products.description: Their beautiful wooden mississippi range, consists of several striking shades. Compliment you home with natural wood oak shades, go for cool white and cream neutrals or go for something extra special with grey shades. With complimentary components, the range will breath a new look into your home. Product id: sdb-wsb0675 fabric colour: white material: bass wood headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 35mm,50mm control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention tape colour: arctic/chalk light filtering: yes mississippi taped white real wood in white.

products.title: Voile Fr Ll Brilliant White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: These beautiful flame retardant translucent fabrics are available in a range of natural colours. This translucent white vertical blind allows the light to filter while retaining privacy and is hand-washable. This pollergen-coated fabric means this fabric is an anti-allergy material, great for windows near a garden. Product id: db-vtb0894 fabric colour: brilliant white material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes voile fr ll brilliant white 89mm vertical blind in white.

products.title: Umbra Blackout White Roller Blind
products.description: Umbra blackout is a stunning range of light blocking rollers. The fabric offers has a stylish two tone weave effect finish. This roller blind works well inmost spaces due to it's blackout properties. Product id: sdb-rbx2253 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes umbra blackout white roller blind in white.

products.title: Vista, Basic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: For all of the cool, with less of the colour, choose the vista in basic white, a sturdy blind made from heavy gauge aluminium, fully adjustable using the pull-cords so that you can allow more or less light in with ease. Made with perforated slats to let the light gently filter through when open or closed, creating a soft atmosphere. Industrialise your home office, where all the work gets done, by settling the basic white amongst functional white furniture and brushed silver fittings.

products.title: Robin N' Frost Roller Blind
products.description: The icy blue colour of the robin n frost roller is perfect for adding a cooler tone to your room - with the icy blue backing and the white print overlaying it makes this blind unique and cool - in more ways than one. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Speciality White Crane Roller Blind
products.description: A strong and bold pattern, the speciality white crane is great for decor's that require a bold repeating pattern that won't dominate the room because of its colour. The blue and white contrast is perfect for rooms across your home, and you can choose this blind to come as either a dimout, blackout or waterproof fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Ecostyle Chalk Faux Wood
products.description: Delivering timeless appeal to your home, ecostyle chalk cream blind features a grain-effect finish in a classic shade. Made from a faux wood material, the blind has a natural-looking aesthetic, yet boasts superior qualities such as its fully waterproof finish. This means it won't warp or crack in moisture prone spaces, such an bathrooms. Frost is a crisp white shade, ideal for ensuring a bright, fresh finish. Made from pvc, it's easy to clean and keep fresh. Their reccomended choice for moisture prone spaces, for example bathrooms. products.title: Lux Brilliant White Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Brilliant White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you want to discover a timeless look that will add a contemporary finishing touch to any room in your home, brilliant white satin deluxe is the perfect choice for you. Sleek, crisp, and simple; every inch is carefully crafted to enable you to sit back and relax like never before. Transform the living room into the relaxing space you never want to leave by combining brilliant white with charcoal fabrics and a laminate wooden floor.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Absolute White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a chic, designer aesthetic, the ecowood deluxe's absolute white fine grain displays a snow-toned, grain-textured faux wood, formed skilfully into wide, adjustable slats. Coordinating fittings feature alongside, including woven linen ladder ribbons for ultimate vogue. Craft a warm and welcoming atmosphere in the guest bedroom, placing the absolute white fine grain amidst warm peach walls and matching white furnishings.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Brilliant White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you trace your eye across brilliant white fine grain deluxe you come to see how the lines gently wind their way across the surface. When you combine this with the purity of the white, you have the perfect way to add a sense of calm and balance to any room you choose. Matching is all about adding colour contrasts that bring both sides of the equation to life. Light wooden floors and dark charcoal fabrics would be inspired choices in the living room.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Washed White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a subtle finish that will please even the most discerning eye, washed white satin is the latest deluxe addition to their ever-popular ecowood range. The white is beautifully accented by the grain of the wood and the linen ladders top things off in style. Take your mind back to the relaxing setting of the coast by working in a light stained wood floor and some light blue walls. Perfect for creating the relaxing ambience that will have you switched off from the events of the day the moment you put your key in the door.

products.title: Raindrop White Roller Blind
products.description: Their raindrop range is inspired by the rain and is available in three classic colours. This white patterned roller blind is the ideal choice for any room in your home as the neutral fabric will look great alongside existing decor. products.title: Isla Pvc Blackout Whisper White Roller Blind
products.description: The subtleness of this exquisite isla pvc blackout whisper white roller blind adds just enough pretty interest to dress up a window. In the palest white with a leafy double-sided design its perfect to create a light and airy space. Ideal for a soft, feminine bedroom, a bathroom or to add a delicate focal point in a kitchen, this dreamy blind is made using a blackout fabric to keep daylight out when you need to and a safe, flame retardant finish.

products.title: Lintex Pvc Blackout Whisp Grey White Roller Blind
products.description: Lintex pvc fabrics provide a nod to industrial styling, the fabric itself have a subtle tile look finish. Available in 5 earthy tones, the range perfectly compliments cool, modern interior styling. As these are a pvc fabric they are both flame retardant & moisture resitent making this an extremely durable product. A light filtering fabric ensures complete privacy without completly blocking out the light. A stunning white shade, this fabric is fresh and clean looking. A welcome additon to your home interiors.
